name: mass_from_to_number
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool unitconversion.
Tool description: App to easily convert units
API description: Converts a mass value from one unit to another using the RapidAPI unit conversion service.

number.description: The numerical value of the mass to be converted.

is_from.description: The unit of mass to convert from (e.g., 'kg', 'lb').

to.description: The unit of mass to convert to (e.g., 'kg', 'lb').
